channel.title: Owner,admin,mod name and crown ingame on screen
channel.description:
hi well im making a server and would like to know how to put a crown and name ingame so they know they are staff i got a pic uploaded on filefront so you can see what i mean coz its hard to describe i dont tihnk its hard to do its just im so nooby i cant do it lol, well i want it so its like that for the admin same for owner sept its owner obviosly and silver one that says mod. plz can someone help me?
http://files.filefront.com/vcvjpg/;13164879;/fileinfo.html
